search.query: index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-RR" | where RequestorODS="$practice_ods$" | join type=outer RequestorODS [search index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-HR"] | join type=outer SenderODS [search index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-HR" | rename RequestorODS as SenderODS | rename RequestorSoftware as SenderSoftware] | rex field=RequestorSoftware "(?<RequestorSupplier>.*)_(?<RequestorSystem>.*)_(?<RequestorVersion>.*)" | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS RequestorODS OUTPUTNEW MName AS MName | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS RequestorODS OUTPUTNEW OrgName AS RequestorOrgName | eval RequestorSupplier=coalesce(RequestorSupplier, RequestorSupplier, "Unknown") | rex field=SenderSoftware "(?<SenderSupplier>.*)_(?<SenderSystem>.*)_(?<SenderVersion>.*)" | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS SenderODS OUTPUTNEW MName AS MName | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS SenderODS OUTPUTNEW OrgName AS SenderOrgName | eval SenderSupplier=coalesce(SenderSupplier, SenderSupplier, MName, MName, "Unknown") | eval ExtractAckCode=if(ExtractAckCode=="00","0",ExtractAckCode) | where ExtractAckCode=0 OR ExtractAckCode=15 AND ExtractAckStatus=1 | stats dc(ConversationID)

index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-RR" | where RequestorODS="$practice_ods$" | join type=outer RequestorODS [search index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-HR"] | join type=outer SenderODS [search index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-HR" | rename RequestorODS as SenderODS | rename RequestorSoftware as SenderSoftware] | rex field=RequestorSoftware "(?<RequestorSupplier>.*)_(?<RequestorSystem>.*)_(?<RequestorVersion>.*)" | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS RequestorODS OUTPUTNEW MName AS MName | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS RequestorODS OUTPUTNEW OrgName AS RequestorOrgName | eval RequestorSupplier=coalesce(RequestorSupplier, RequestorSupplier, "Unknown") | rex field=SenderSoftware "(?<SenderSupplier>.*)_(?<SenderSystem>.*)_(?<SenderVersion>.*)" | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS SenderODS OUTPUTNEW MName AS MName | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS SenderODS OUTPUTNEW OrgName AS SenderOrgName | eval SenderSupplier=coalesce(SenderSupplier, SenderSupplier, MName, MName, "Unknown") | eval ExtractAckCode=if(ExtractAckCode=="00","0",ExtractAckCode) | where ExtractAckCode!=0 AND ExtractAckCode!=15 AND ExtractAckStatus!=1 | stats dc(ConversationID)

panel.title: Large message general failures with integrated status

search.query: index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-RR" | where RequestorODS="$practice_ods$" | join type=outer RequestorODS [search index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-HR"] | join type=outer SenderODS [search index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-HR" | rename RequestorODS as SenderODS | rename RequestorSoftware as SenderSoftware] | rex field=RequestorSoftware "(?<RequestorSupplier>.*)_(?<RequestorSystem>.*)_(?<RequestorVersion>.*)" | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS RequestorODS OUTPUTNEW MName AS MName | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS RequestorODS OUTPUTNEW OrgName AS RequestorOrgName | eval RequestorSupplier=coalesce(RequestorSupplier, RequestorSupplier, "Unknown") | rex field=SenderSoftware "(?<SenderSupplier>.*)_(?<SenderSystem>.*)_(?<SenderVersion>.*)" | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS SenderODS OUTPUTNEW MName AS MName | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS SenderODS OUTPUTNEW OrgName AS SenderOrgName | eval SenderSupplier=coalesce(SenderSupplier, SenderSupplier, MName, MName, "Unknown") | eval ExtractAckCode=if(ExtractAckCode=="00","0",ExtractAckCode) | eval ExtractAckCode=coalesce(ExtractAckCode, ExtractAckCode, "None") | where ExtractAckCode=30 AND ExtractAckStatus=1 | stats dc(ConversationID) as Total

index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-RR" | where RequestFailurePoint=0 OR RequestFailurePoint=60 | where RequestorODS="$practice_ods$" | join type=outer RequestorODS [search index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-HR"] | join type=outer SenderODS [search index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-HR" | rename RequestorODS as SenderODS | rename RequestorSoftware as SenderSoftware] | rex field=RequestorSoftware "(?<RequestorSupplier>.*)_(?<RequestorSystem>.*)_(?<RequestorVersion>.*)" | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS RequestorODS OUTPUTNEW MName AS MName | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS RequestorODS OUTPUTNEW OrgName AS RequestorOrgName | eval RequestorSupplier=coalesce(RequestorSupplier, RequestorSupplier, "Unknown") | rex field=SenderSoftware "(?<SenderSupplier>.*)_(?<SenderSystem>.*)_(?<SenderVersion>.*)" | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS SenderODS OUTPUTNEW MName AS MName | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS SenderODS OUTPUTNEW OrgName AS SenderOrgName | eval SenderSupplier=coalesce(SenderSupplier, SenderSupplier, MName, MName, "Unknown") | eval ExtractAckCode=if(ExtractAckCode=="00","0",ExtractAckCode) | where ExtractAckCode!=0 AND ExtractAckCode!=15 | dedup ConversationID | table ExtractAckTime, ConversationID, RegistrationSmartcardUID, RequestFailurePoint, RequestFailureType, ExtractAckCode, ExtractAckStatus, RequestorOrgName, RequestorODS, RequestorSupplier, RequestorSystem, RequestorVersion, SenderOrgName, SenderODS, SenderSupplier, SenderSystem, SenderVersion | sort ExtractAckTime

panel.title: Unsuccessful requests with failure points (trends only - no ConversationIDs)

search.query: index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-RR" | where RequestFailurePoint!=0 AND RequestFailurePoint!=60 | where RequestorODS="$practice_ods$" | join type=outer RequestorODS [search index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-HR"] | rex field=RequestorSoftware "(?<RequestorSupplier>.*)_(?<RequestorSystem>.*)_(?<RequestorVersion>.*)" | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS RequestorODS OUTPUTNEW MName AS MName | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS RequestorODS OUTPUTNEW OrgName AS RequestorOrgName | eval RequestorSupplier=coalesce(RequestorSupplier, RequestorSupplier, "Unknown") | eval ExtractAckCode=coalesce(ExtractAckCode, ExtractAckCode, "None") | stats dc(RequestFailureTime) by RequestFailurePoint

index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-RR" | where RequestorODS="$practice_ods$" | join type=outer RequestorODS [search index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-HR"] | join type=outer SenderODS [search index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-HR" | rename RequestorODS as SenderODS | rename RequestorSoftware as SenderSoftware] | rex field=RequestorSoftware "(?<RequestorSupplier>.*)_(?<RequestorSystem>.*)_(?<RequestorVersion>.*)" | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS RequestorODS OUTPUTNEW MName AS MName | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS RequestorODS OUTPUTNEW OrgName AS RequestorOrgName | eval RequestorSupplier=coalesce(RequestorSupplier, RequestorSupplier, "Unknown") | rex field=SenderSoftware "(?<SenderSupplier>.*)_(?<SenderSystem>.*)_(?<SenderVersion>.*)" | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS SenderODS OUTPUTNEW MName AS MName | lookup Spine2-NACS-Lookup NACS AS SenderODS OUTPUTNEW OrgName AS SenderOrgName | eval SenderSupplier=coalesce(SenderSupplier, SenderSupplier, MName, MName, "Unknown") | eval ExtractAckCode=if(ExtractAckCode=="00","0",ExtractAckCode) | eval ExtractAckCode=coalesce(ExtractAckCode, ExtractAckCode, "None") | where ExtractAckStatus!=1 | dedup ConversationID | table ExtractAckTime, ConversationID, RegistrationSmartcardUID, RequestFailurePoint, RequestFailureType, ExtractAckCode, ExtractAckStatus, RequestorOrgName, RequestorODS, RequestorSupplier, RequestorSystem, RequestorVersion, SenderOrgName, SenderODS, SenderSupplier, SenderSystem, SenderVersion | sort ExtractAckTime
index="gp2gp-mi" sourcetype="gppractice-RR" | where RequestorODS="$practice_ods$" | stats dc(RegistrationTime) as Requests by RequestFailureType
